Episodes.Title: Save the Raccoon!
Episodes.Plot: When the Flyboat breaks down, the pets must use recycled materials to create a new one.

Episodes.Title: Save the Loch Ness Monster!
Episodes.Plot: The Pets travel to Scotland to help the infamous Loch Ness Monster.

Episodes.Title: Save the Cool Cat and the Hip Hippo!
Episodes.Plot: Cool Cat and Hip Hippo both love performing, but at the same time, so The Wonder Pets show them how to work together.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Tuck and Buck!
Episodes.Plot: Tuck gets jealous of Buck's skateboarding ability.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Save the Mermaid!
Episodes.Plot: The Pets try to help a mermaid who wants to become a pirate.

Episodes.Title: Save the Pony Express!
Episodes.Plot: The Pets help a young pony make her first delivery as part of the Pony Express.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Save the Honey Bears!
Episodes.Plot: The Pets must convince a pair of bears to share a pot of honey with each other.
